pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Visualization of Linear Panel Event Studies // Estimates linear panel event study models. Plots coefficients following the recommendations in Freyaldenhoven et al. (2021) doi:10.3386/w29170. Includes sup-t bands, testing for key hypotheses, least wiggly path through the Wald region. Allows instrumental variables estimation following Freyaldenhoven et al. (2019) doi:10.1257/aer.20180609.
